title: Personalized Event Suggestions for Connection
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want personalized event suggestions based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and engage with my community more easily.

title: Scheduled Video Calls with Family Members
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to schedule video calls with my family members easily so that I can stay connected with them without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Interest-Based Community Interaction - Facilitating Local Meetups for Social Inclusion
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to receive suggestions for local events based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and combat feelings of isolation.

title: Memory Lane – Voice Playback of Memorable Messages from Family
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to listen to memorable messages from my family so that I can feel more connected and less isolated when I am unable to travel.

title: Voice-to-Text Messaging for Easy Connectivity
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to send messages using voice-to-text so that I can easily communicate with my family and friends without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Conversation Starters for Enhanced Engagement
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want conversation starters suggested by ALFRED so that I can stay socially connected and engage in meaningful interactions with my family and friends.

title: Crisis Support and Intervention – Proactive Check-Ins for High-Risk Times
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to proactively check in with me during high-risk times so that I feel supported and less isolated, especially when I cannot travel or my mobility is limited.
